properties.address: St Josephs, Fenella Ave, , Douglas, isle of man IM2 6PD
properties.description: Every Thursday 12-2 we run a warm space with our community fridge, where each week anyone can drop in and have a meal and take home a bag of groceries. Then 2-3 each week looks different throughout the month, with well being, guest speakers & craft.
properties.title: Living Hope Church
